doc:
Juanita Moore https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juanita_Moore 0 Juanita Moore (October 19, 1914 – January 1, 2014) was an American film, television, and stage actress. She was the fifth African American to be nominated for an Academy Award in any category, and the third in the Supporting Actress category at a time when only a single African American, Hattie McDaniel in Gone with the Wind (1939), had won an Oscar. Her most famous role was as Annie Johnson in the movie Imitation of Life (1959). Juanita_Moore ( October_19_,_1914 – January_1_,_2014 ) was an_American_film , television , and stage_actress . She was the_fifth_African_American to_be_nominated for an_Academy_Award in any_category , and the_third in the_Supporting_Actress_category at a_time when only_a_single_African_American_,_Hattie_McDaniel in Gone with the_Wind_(_1939_) , had_won an_Oscar . Her_most_famous_role was as Annie_Johnson in the_movie_Imitation of Life (_1959_) .
